title: Free ADU home tour gives an inside look at living small in L.A.
dc:creator: Lisa Boone
description: Ever wondered what it's like to live in a 400-square-foot garage conversion? Find out at this wide-ranging ADU tour in Los Angeles.
content:encoded: Ever wondered what it's like to live in a 400-square-foot garage conversion? Find out at this wide-ranging ADU tour in Los Angeles.

media:content.media:description: A two-story garage conversion in Venice by Bau10, which shares space with a white stucco home, will be open for tours this weekend.
